dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.deleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete this link?
dashboard.deletePasteConfirm: Do you really want to delete this paste?

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys for programmatic access to Zhort
apiKeys.createFirst: Create your first API key to get started
apiKeys.copyWarning: Copy this key now. You won't be able to see it again!
apiKeys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.
apiKeys.docDescription: Use your API key to create and manage links programmatically.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: Receive real-time notifications when events occur
webhooks.createFirst: Create your first webhook to receive real-time notifications
webhooks.testSuccess: Test webhook sent successfully! Check your endpoint.
webhooks.securityNote: Each webhook request includes an X-Zhort-Signature header with an HMAC signature for verification. The secret will be shown once after creation.
webhooks.docDescription: Webhooks send POST requests with the following payload structure:
webhooks.verifySignature: Verify the signature using HMAC-SHA256 with your webhook secret.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Collaborate on links and campaigns together.
teams.createFirstTeam: Create your first team to get started.
teams.settingsComingSoon: Settings for team name and deletion coming soon.

bulk.title: Bulk URL Shortening
bulk.description: Shorten multiple URLs at once - perfect for marketing campaigns and newsletters
bulk.urlsHint: Enter one URL per line. Maximum 100 URLs per batch.
bulk.tip1: CSV can optionally contain header row
bulk.tip3: Results can be exported as CSV
bulk.failedWarning: Link(s) could not be created. Please check the error messages.

integrations.title: Enterprise Integrations
integrations.description: Connect Zhort with your workflows and AI agents.
integrations.mcpDescription: Use Zhort directly from your AI editor (like Cursor) or other MCP-enabled tools. The MCP server provides tools for shortening links and retrieving statistics.
integrations.configHint: Add this URL to your MCP client configuration (e.g. in Cursor Settings > Features > MCP).

sso.title: Enterprise SSO
sso.description: Manage Single Sign-On for your organization domain.
sso.verificationHint: Please add the following TXT record to your DNS configuration:
sso.adminsHint: Admins can view this domain and update the Identity Provider configuration.
sso.addDomainHint: Add your company domain to enable Single Sign-On.

schedule.title: Link Scheduling
schedule.description: Schedule activation and deactivation of your links
schedule.fallbackHint: URL shown when the link is not active
schedule.noSchedulesHint: Create a schedule to activate links based on time
schedule.dateRequired: Please provide at least a start or end date
schedule.deleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete this schedule?

history.title: Audit Log / History
history.description: Track all changes to this link.

masking.title: Link Masking
masking.description: Customize how your link is displayed to visitors
masking.frameDescription: Display the destination URL within an iframe on your domain. The short link stays in the address bar.
masking.adv1: Keeps your short URL visible in the browser
masking.adv2: Maintains branding throughout the user journey
masking.lim2: May affect SEO and social sharing
masking.splashDescription: Show a custom splash screen before redirecting to the destination URL.
masking.htmlHint: Use HTML and Tailwind CSS classes. The splash will auto-redirect after the specified duration.
masking.useCase3: Build anticipation with branded loading screens

redirects.title: Smart Redirects
redirects.description: Configure device and geo-based redirect rules
redirects.howItWorksHint: Rules are evaluated in order from top to bottom. The first matching rule determines where the user is redirected.
redirects.createFirst: Create your first rule to enable smart redirects
redirects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this redirect rule?
